SEARCH
Package chess.logic.board

Class Square

java.lang.Object
chess.logic.board.Square
Direct Known Subclasses:
Square.EmptySquare, Square.FullSquare
public abstract class Square extends Object
Square represents a single square on a chess board. Each square has a coordinate and can be either occupied by a piece or empty.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Class

    Represents an empty square on the chess board.
    static final class

  • Method Details

    • isOccupied

      public abstract boolean isOccupied()
      Checks if the square is occupied by a piece.
      Returns:
      True if the square is occupied, false otherwise.

    • getPiece

      public abstract Piece getPiece()
      Returns the piece on the square, or null if there is none.
      Returns:
      The piece on the square, or null if empty.

    • createSquare

      public static Square createSquare(int squareCoord, Piece piece)
      Creates a new square with the specified coordinate and piece.
      Parameters:
      squareCoord - The coordinate of the square.
      piece - The piece to be placed on the square, or null if the square is empty.
      Returns:
      A Square object representing the specified square.

    • getCoord

      public int getCoord()
      Retrieves the coordinate of the square.
      Returns:
      The coordinate of the square.
